keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.text:
• A - Add New Note
  • Left Arrow - Previous Cards
  • Right Arrow - Next Cards
  • Ctrl+P - Quick Search
  • Ctrl+Enter - Submit Note while in editor

markdown.title: Markdown Guide
markdown.text:
Titles

  • # Title
  • ## Sub-Title
  • ### Sub-sub-title ^^

Formatting

  • *Italic*
  • **bold**
  • ~~strikethrough~~

Lists

  • 1. Ordered List
  • * Unordered List
  • - [ ] Task List

Other

  • `inline code`
  • ``` code snippet ```
  • > quote
  • [Link](http://mdyna.github.io)
